title: 999 ping in champ loading screen
body: I always have high ping in champ loading screen everytime, then in game the ping is like 2000-3000, it happened since last patch game is unplayable i cant do anything, also there is nothing working beside the game no downloads i mean or things like that

replies.body: It seems that you are having a network issue that's failing to hold down a strong connection, which can cause you to lose sync and ultimately disconnect.  I suggest going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tighten up your connection and get back in-game.  Let me know if you have any questions.

Man ,its been happening since the latest network maintenance or something you did yesterday, i dont remember whats its called, if its my internet connection then i should have had this problem for long time already 3000 ping is something abnormal not from my router or packet loss
